Soldiers are similar to Guards except they are higher level and are found only in Yanille. They are under the command of Colonel Radick.

They appear to be wearing a Steel med helm, a Steel chainbody, Leather gloves and Leather boots. They also wield a Steel longsword as a weapon.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The guards in East Ardougne have a similar clothing style to that of the Yanille soldiers (blue shirt and red trousers), the only difference being that the Ardougne guards have long sleeve shirts and the Yanille soldiers have short sleeves.
